thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears’ Daughter Maddie Looks Happy To Be Back At School Following ATV Accident!
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears’ Daughter Maddie Looks Happy To Be Back At School Following ATV Accident!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Jamie Lynn Spears’ Daughter Maddie Looks Happy To Be Back At School Following ATV Accident!
text:
2/14/2017 5:01 PM ET | Filed under: Jamie Lynn Spears • Twitter • Health • Family • Jamie Lynn Smith • Celeb Kidz • Instagram 
It's SO good to see Jamie Lynn Spears ' daughter Maddie recovering after her terrifying ATV accident last week! 
As you surely know, the eight-year-old was seen leaving the hospital on Friday following an accident which left her under water for several minutes. 
Related: Britney Spears Thanks Fans For Support! 
On Tuesday though, she was cleared to go back to school to visit her classmates. Jamie shared a new picture (above) of her happy, look-alike daughter to Instagram and Twitter on Valentine's Day, sharing the caption: 
"Maddie isn't quite ready to return to school, but her doctors did clear her to bring in her Valentine's Day treats to her class today. Thanks to @avery and @hersheycompany for making these treats for her to pass out, since I didn't have the time to make any myself this year. It made her so happy to see her friends, and be able to give them such cute treats. It was a great moment for us after everything that has happened. We are so thankful to celebrate Valentine's Day with the ones we love, and we don't take a second of it for granted ❤️Happy Valentine's Day❤️" 
Aww! Even if she's not ready to get back to school, at least Maddie got to celebrate the holiday with her friends and eat some chocolate. 
We hope she takes it easy while she recovers — and Jamie too!
